statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: Why hello there fellow traveler!

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: My Name is Sir Jonathan!

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: What brings you to me today?

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: Well...

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: I'm looking for Blue

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: Blue? Is that a friend of yours or...

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: Not a friend, or a tangible thing really.

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: Oh?

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: It's more of a conceptual thing

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: The concept of Blue?

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: Oh!

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: How very abstract!

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: *Hmmmm. I wonder if Paladin sweat is blue enough...*

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: How can I help?

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: Well...

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: I doubt you’d be able to help. I could easily handle this on my own.

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: Helping others brings me joy! Please, I insist.

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: But your muscles…

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: Yes? I’ve been working on them for quite some time.

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: That’s surprising. They look neglected…

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: as if you’ve been questless for quite some time.

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: I’ll have you know that I organize all of my Quests by Muscle Groupings!

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: In fact...

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: I'll have you know that today is Chest Quest day.

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: Well, let’s see if you’ve got the XP to back that up…

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: …in a push-up competition!

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: Bring it on, coward!

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: I will not yield to my lactic acids!
You've obtained the Paladin's Toxic Masculinity Sweat!

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: I doubled your push-up count.

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: That better prove my worth to you.

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: Now, what can I help you with?

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: You already have.

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: Excuse me?

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: I just needed some of your Blue sweat.

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: How did you know I sweat Blue?

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: I didn’t…

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: Well, have a nice day!

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: Hmmm. I’m gonna walk around some more. I’ll let you know if I find anything!

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: Sounds like a plan, young one. What’s your name?

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: I’m Pal!

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: A fitting name. Good luck on your quest for Blue!

options.optionText: I could challenge his masculinity in a push-up contest...
I should find another way to make him sweat

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: I’m keeping the rest of my fluids to myself, thank you very much.

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: How goes it, Pal?

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: I'm still clueless and Blueless

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: Keep your chin up!

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: Nice knife. Too bad you’d have to be some sort of Assassin to hurt me with that.

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: I wasn’t going to-

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: Yeah. That’s what they all say. Take a walk, if you know what’s good for you.

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: Welcome back, Pal! How goes your quest for Blue?

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: Well I found something, but it’s not Blue, unfortunately.

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: Well, don’t give up! I’m sure a resourceful fellow like you will be Blue in no time.

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: Yeah well, I’m a bit more worried about being Red.

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: I found something S I N I S T E R.

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: Good heavens! That’s the blade of an Assassin…

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: An assassin must be hiding amongst us. I can’t believe this.

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: Are you going to be okay? You look stressed.

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: Of course I’ll be okay!

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: You’re shaking.

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: I’m generating kinetic energy.

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: And the Blue sweat that’s beading on your head?

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: That’s not sweat-

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: It’s…

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: THE FLUID OF J U S T I C E!

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: I will bring an end to this. Don’t you worry young Pal.

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: Thanks for the sweat!

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: Hmmm?
You obtain a few droplets of Jonathan’s profuse J U S T I C E  S W E A T.

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: Uh, don't worry about it! See you later!

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: Be careful with that horrible blade.

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: It's too bad I don't have a sheathe for it.

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: I can’t believe he’s dead.

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: He looks so…alive.

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: If only there were someone who could help make him actually alive.

statements.speaker: Bard
statements.text: Why helloooooooo there!

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: Who are you?

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: Can't you see I’m grieving here…

statements.speaker: Bard
statements.text: Who are any of us, really…

statements.speaker: Bard
statements.text: …but instruments in the ballad the of time.

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: I-

statements.speaker: Bard
statements.text: All of us, a symphony, waiting for our solo moment…

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: Actually, I would like to be-

statements.speaker: Bard
statements.text: Yearning to be heard! Yearning for their moment!

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: I needed Blue. But all I got was Red.

statements.speaker: Bard
statements.text: Yearning for peace! That’s what I see in your eyes, my friend.

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: No, you misheard me I’m-

statements.speaker: Bard
statements.text: Well, I’ve got just the thing if you’re feeling blue.

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: Oh no

statements.speaker: Bard
statements.text: Here’s one of my favorite songs to play.

statements.speaker: Bard
statements.text: As the sun goes down, on this Blue night.

statements.speaker: Bard
statements.text: A friend cries eternal, tears for the knight.

statements.speaker: Bard
statements.text: A solemn hymn, for a solid him.

statements.speaker: Bard
statements.text: A moment grim, from the Reaper’s whim.
You stomached The Bard’s Requiem!

statements.speaker: Bard
statements.text: ...and scene!

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: That's your favouriste song?

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: AHHHHHHHHH!

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: I’m so happy you’re back!

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: …Are you good?

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: THE TORMENT! I’VE FELT IT ALL.

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: BROKEN BONE.

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: A G O N Y.

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: THE COLLECTIVE GRIEF OF ALL THAT DECAYS…

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: THE TORMENT! I’VE FELT IT ALL.

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: …then a deafening, all-encompassing silence.

statements.speaker: Pal
statements.text: A-aren’t you happy to be alive?

statements.speaker: Sir_Jonathan
statements.text: After that…
